bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Baer family were German immigrants, who settled in Panther Gap area of Rockbridge Co., Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains principally business and family correspondence of Jacob, Joseph, and John Baer. Includes land maps, indentures, wills, militia fines, bills and receipts. Also included are a German family Bible (l744) and other genealogical materials, some relating to the Decker and Hite (Heyt) families, as well as two farming account books of Joseph Baer, 1853-1859. The collection mainly concerns the sale, rental, and inheritance of the Baer property.
